alert.note: Alert for Rutherford; Williamson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 13 at 6:29PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Rutherford and east central Williamson Counties through 715 PM CDT... At 629 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Murfreesboro. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Murfreesboro, Smyrna, Nolensville, Triune and Rockvale. This includes the following highways... Interstate 24 between mile markers 68 and 84. Interstate 840 between mile markers 41 and 55. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
